mapper.select: select bm.bm_id, bm.bm_pw, bm.bm_num, bm.bm_phone, bm.bm_contents, bm.bm_address, bm.bm_geocoding_lati, bm.bm_geocoding_longi, bm.bm_manager, bm.bm_store_name, bm.bm_image, bm.bm_approval, st.st_num from manager bm join store st on bm_id = st_bm_id where bm_store_name like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%')

select * from manager where bm_store_name like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%') and 5000 > st_distance_sphere(Point(#{ipLongi}, #{ipLati}), Point(bm_geocoding_longi, bm_geocoding_lati)) order by st_distance_sphere(Point(#{ipLongi}, #{ipLati}), Point(bm_geocoding_longi, bm_geocoding_lati)) asc
